response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the bottom cabinet. The next step is to grasp the saucepan from the cabinet.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the countertop.
(2) Grasp the mustard leaf.
(3) Move the robot to the bottom cabinet.
(4) Open the bottom cabinet.
(5) Grasp the saucepan.
(6) Move the robot to the stove.
(7) Put the mustard leaf into the saucepan.
(8) Put the saucepan on the stove.
(9) Turn on the stove to cook the mustard leaf.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Grasp the saucepan
    saucepan_205 = registry(env,"saucepan_205")
    EasyGrasp(robot, saucepan_205)
    donothing(env)
